My recollection of Beyond Freedom was that while the graphics looked 
closer to a professional game, the viewing perspective was off, and 
the lack of frames of animation was pretty bad -- I actually ended up 
prefering the graphics of the first Gladiator.

What exactly do the text conversion programs do?  A while back I 
tried playing around with the editor and didn't really have any 
success -- does the text version make it easier?

Mark
